# MATH 253: Machine Learning {-}

![[Image source](https://cdn.redshift.autodesk.com/2016/05/Machine-Learning-hero.jpg)](images/ml_robot.jpg)


This is the class manual for Machine Learning (MATH 253) at Macalester College. The content here was made by [Leslie Myint](https://lmyint.github.io) and draws upon our class textbook, [An Introduction to Statistical Learning with Applications in R](http://www-bcf.usc.edu/~gareth/ISL/), and on [materials](https://ajohns24.github.io/253_Fall_18/index.html) prepared by [Alicia Johnson](http://aliciajohnson78.weebly.com/).
